ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New Xegony Bard
ygData.msgSnippet: Runed Bone Fork can be put in either primary weap or ranged slot. Not that great in the primary slot, so best to use in the ranged slot.
ygData.messageBody:
Runed Bone Fork can be put in either primary weap or ranged slot.
Not that great in the primary slot, so best to use in the ranged slot.
http://eqdb.allakhazam.com/item.html?item=641

---Windleaf

At 09:41 AM 4/9/01 -0400, you wrote:
>Hi, I'm Atonal, another Xegony bard. I'm in all lambent still (except for
>boots...a guildmate gave me SS boots), course, I'm only 30, creeping up on
>31. :) Dalnir's groups are phenomenal xp.
>
>Hey Bril, I notice you say your Runed Bone Fork is in your range slot? I
>have one also, but mine only goes in the primary slot? I'm confused...is
>there more than one RBF?
>
>Atonal
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Rebecca Small [mailto:rsmall@...]
>Sent: Monday, April 09, 2001 9:25 AM
>To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
>Subject: [eqbards] New Xegony Bard
>
>
>Hail Tzeetch! I'm on Xegony too! Brilinnia is my bard's name, although I've
>played this game so long I have 2 alternates: Brilinia (wiz) and Brillinia
>(cleric). There's several Xegony bards on this list. Glad to have you! What
>guild are you in, or are you?
>Equipment wise, sounds like you need some Hate and HS time. Definitely do
>the tamborine quest, much easier than camping the sharkdrum! Also, try to
>get into Vox/Nag raids before it's too late!
>I am a patchwork bard but here's what I use as of last night:
>Head: Hammerhead Helm
>Face: another WW drop here, forgot which one
>Neck: I forgot the exact name, one of those things off the WW dragons that
>have awesome stats.
>Chest: Imbrued
>Arms: SS (had kylong til last weekend, Neero felt sorry for me!)
>Wrists: kylong and hero
>Hands: SS
>Waist: sash of the dragonborn
>Legs: kylong (but I put in an order for some out of WW last night!)
>
>Feet: Imbrued
>Primary: rare dagger off seb jugs (I'm at work, can't look at equip.)
>Secondary: martune rapier
>Range: Runed bone fork
>Sharkskin drum, gypsy lute, horn
>
>I hate Karnors. Seems to be full of idiots everytime I zone in and I need to
>go camp the warlord for the skull for the epic! Blah!
>
>Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe (yellow and a half to 56, that means about a month?)
>Excalibur, Xegony
>
>
>

>with the subject submissions.
